original_title: President Ranil Wickremesinghe meets with Indian PM at COP28
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – Sri Lankan president Ranil Wickremesinghe has met with Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi, during the United Nations Climate Change Conference COP28, held in Dubai, UAE.
The Indian Prime Minister, in a message posted on X, formerly known as Twitter, said that discussions were held between the two leaders on various topics.
The President also engaged in bilateral discussions with the Greek Prime Minister.
